file_content.text: Breakouts, traitors--the Republic should bomb this place flat and start over.
When the Empire blew one of the vaults open, Commander Geland found an ancient computer inside.
He said the computer had data about Belsavis. He wanted to go back and study it.
Did this computer have information about an elder race?
Anything on the Esh-kha?
If it did, he never told me.
Sounds promising.
Then I should get moving.
The vault isn't far, but since the alien population broke out, it's a war zone.
But if you can reach it, that computer probably has whatever you're looking for. And then you can punish Commander Geland, right?
I'll make my judgment once I find him.
If he won't see reason.
I have a few questions for him first.
After I interrogate him.
This is a place of justice and punishment, after all.
Absolutely.
I should see to the... the bodies. I can't let their IDs fall into enemy hands. Best of luck, Jedi.
[The ID card reads "Commander S. Geland, Republic Security."]
[The face on the card doesn't match any of the bodies around you.]
Don't move. Don't say anything.
Now he can't see us. I ran all the way here. I couldn't risk Commander Geland getting you, too.
So he's a traitor.
Geland did this?
Explain yourself!
Drop the blaster, then we can talk.
Put your weapon down.
No. I've had this since the riot began, and I'm not going unprotected now.
I called Commander Geland on the holo and said a Jedi Master was coming to see him. He just said, "Thanks, Komi."
Then he... killed everyone. With some sort of lightning. All I could do was watch.
Is Child of Emperor. Must be.
Well. There's one Child of the Emperor who doesn't go for subtlety.
I guess we tipped off a Child of the Emperor.
Child of the Emperor. Needs putting down.
And if that's his ID card, there's no way to track him down.
Any idea what he wants? Or where he would go?
What might he be planning?
I don't know! The last few days have been a nightmare, now this.
Even if I find Commander Geland, he'll never help me.
My mission's in jeopardy.
I don't give up that easily.
The board just lit up! We can track our teams, control the perimeter--everything! Thank you.
Any Jedi would have been eager to help.
I was only doing my duty.
My pleasure.
Now, you were asking about Belsavis's history.
Never mind thanks, where's Commander Geland?
You owe me a favor, remember?
Let me see. Commander Geland is... here, with his team in one of the cells. He can tell you about the vaults, or whatever you need.
This seems an odd time to be wandering around the cells.
What's he doing in there?
The log says he's investigating how the Empire breached our security.
Thanks, and take care.
Stay in one piece.
I'll put a holocall through to that cell, so Commander Geland knows you're coming.
Now you've restored the locators, we just might survive. Please, stay safe.
Sorry, I need to focus on my work.
